commits.name: cart
commits.content: # jsx-a11y/tabindex-no-positive üíº This rule is enabled in the following configs: ‚òëÔ∏è `recommended`, üîí `strict`. Avoid positive `tabIndex` property values to synchronize the flow of the page with keyboard tab order. ## Rule details This rule takes no arguments. ### Succeed ```jsx foo bar baz ``` ### Fail ```jsx foo bar baz never really sure what goes after baz ``` ## Accessibility guidelines - [WCAG 2.4.3](https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/focus-order) ### Resources - [Chrome Audit Rules, AX_FOCUS_03](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/accessibility-developer-tools/wiki/Audit-Rules#ax_focus_03)
